title: CRC Pastor with Jordan Peterson on CS Lewis, the Resurrection, his Biblical series,

I want to thank Josh https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuJeLVw8LkHHZ372ZwgThfw for giving me his time. 

We had a wonderful time talking about a number of things. I hope you all enjoy the talk as much as I did.
